Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Identify the bathroom sink.', '2. Plug the sink and fill it with water.', '3. Add soap to the w
ater in the sink and mix until foamy.']

behavior identify_bathroom_sink(bathroom:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(sink, bathroom)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        identify_bathroom_sink(bathroom, sink)
